column4: I changed to ubuntu recently... one of the things I love about kde (vs gnome) was the built-in colorpicker.... is there a widget like that for ubuntu/gnome?
you could always use kubuntu (ubuntu with KDE)
I stayed in the "tray" and remembered the last 30 colors you picked... each had a context and ability to copy the HTML color code, RGB color code, etc...
nah... i really prefer gnome (or LXDE)).
